Pre-Game Insights: Alex Cobb surrendered three earned runs in 2.2 innings in Game 1.
Tanner Bibee has two postseason starts with a 2.08 ERA.
Gerrit Cole was 8-5 with a 3.41 ERA in 17 starts in 2024.
Carlos Rodon was great in 6.0 innings with one earned run in Game 1.
Aaron Judge has recorded at least one RBI in each of the Yankees' last five games as favorites against the Guardians.
Juan Soto has scored at least one run in each of his last seven home appearances against the Guardians.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Eight of the Guardians' last nine games as road underdogs have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Each of the Yankees' last four games against AL Central opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Yankees' last five night games at Yankee Stadium.
